entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
